---
title: "Create a Database"
sidebarTitle: "Create a Database"
description: "Creates a Database instance hosted on Square Cloud."
api: "POST https://api.squarecloud.app/v2/databases"
authMethod: "none"
---

import Authorization from "/snippets/api/auth.mdx";

## Request

### Headers

<Authorization />

### Body

<ParamField body="name" type="string" placeholder="database name" required>
  The name of the Database. Must be [a-z] [A-Z] [0-9].
</ParamField>
<ParamField body="memory" type="int" placeholder="RAM(in MB)" required>
  The RAM allocated to it. Redis minimum is 512 and Mongo, 1024.
</ParamField>
<ParamField body="type" type="string" placeholder="database(mongo,redis)" required>
  The database type, Mongo, Redis or any other available.
</ParamField>
<ParamField body="version" type="string" placeholder="Version number" required>
  The version of Database. Mongo 8.0.11 and Redis 7.4.5.
</ParamField>

## Response

<ResponseField name="status" type="string">
  Indicates whether the call was successful. `success` if successful, `error` if not.
</ResponseField>
<ResponseField name="response" type="object">

The contents of the response.
<Expandable title="Toggle object">
<ResponseField name="id" type="string">
  The ID of the database.
</ResponseField>
<ResponseField name="name" type="string">
  The name you have choosed to the Database
</ResponseField>
<ResponseField name="memory" type="int">
  The memory allocated to the database
</ResponseField>
<ResponseField name="cpu" type="int">
  The number of vCPUs allocated to the database
</ResponseField>
<ResponseField name="type" type="string">
  The type of the database.
</ResponseField>
<ResponseField name="password" type="string">
  The password for the database.
</ResponseField>
<ResponseField name="certificate" type="string">
  The certificate needed to connect to it. You can save it in a `.pem` file.
</ResponseField>
<ResponseField name="connection_url" type="string">
  The url to connect to the database.
</ResponseField>
</Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<ResponseExample>
```json
{
  "status":"success",
  "response": {
    "id": "a14b8d5e1cb7405a851eb4c075506121",
    "name": "test",
    "memory": 1024,
    "cpu": 2,
    "type": "mongo",
    "password": "XidqYaU154Bmq1qsNbDXORW2",
    "certificate": "",
    "connection_url": "mongodb://default:XidqYaU154Bmq1qsNbDXORW2@square-cloud-db-a14b8d5e1cb7405a851eb4c075506121.squareweb.app:7015"
    }
}
```
</ResponseExample>
